title: Introducing: Diamond Empire
body:
It’s going to be impossible to write this without including at least one reference to recent chart success story London Grammar.

**Diamond Empire** comprised of Karina Byrne, Jonny Beck, Andy White and John Winfield, undoubtedly share certain sonic similarities, most notably in Byrne’s vocals, that bare a striking resemblance to those of LG’s Hannah Reid. Their most recent track, the slow burning _All This Talk_ conjures up a similar, atmospheric, 80’s pop vibe, yet without the hip-hop influences, simply relying upon it’s out and out pop tendencies.

Whilst it’s still early days for **Diamond Empire**, and their debut track, Secret City has the ‘new band awkwardness’ to it, there’s definitely a colossal amount of potential there, and with the investment of time (alongside money, sadly), you’d be naive to bet against them.
